title: CEO & CoFounder
organization_short_description: Decisely is reimagining the way brokers and small businesses work together. The Decisely solution provides the best combination of benefits, HR resources, and technology to support small businesses.
subject: Kevin + Decisely ICHRA + SMB benefits
emailBody: Hey Kevin — saw Decisely expand healthcare offerings with Decisely ICHRA to give small employers more flexible benefits. I wanted to run something by you since SMB buyers often pause when benefits complexity or budget uncertainty pops up, and hiring teams delay enrollment while they shop options. We run a database reactivation service that re-engages those inactive leads with light SMS/email follow-ups tied to product updates and platform improvements. For Decisely, it’s a way to turn stalled SMB prospects into active enrollments without adding headcount. Would you like me to send a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -Alex

title: Founder - CEO
organization_short_description: Harbor.ai is an insurance marketplace driven by Artificial Intelligence.
subject: Paul + AI-driven underwriting platform + underwriting workflows
emailBody: Hey Paul — saw Harborai launch an AI-driven underwriting platform and collaborative workspace to cut assessment time in half. I wanted to run something by you since teams who adopt these tools still end up with paused broker proposals and older pipeline contacts that never convert when timing or perceived complexity stalls deals. We run a database reactivation service that nudges those inactive leads with light SMS/email tied to platform updates and faster underwriting outcomes. For Harbor, it’s a low-touch way to turn paused conversations into adopters without adding headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}

title: Co-Founder & CEO
subject: Dan + $30M Raise + climate homes
emailBody: Hey Dan — saw Stand secure $30M and launch its homeowners product for climate-impacted California properties using physics-driven AI. I wanted to run something by you since Stand likely has pockets of paused or hesitant homeowners leads — those worried about wildfire/flood risk or stalled by higher-touch underwriting and premium uncertainty. We run a database reactivation service that re-engages inactive prospects with light, personalized SMS/email sequences tied to product updates and AI risk mitigations. For Stand, it’s a way to convert paused conversations into policies and accelerate your write targets without extra headcount. Would you like me to send over a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}

title: CEO and Co-Founder
organization_short_description: Relm Insurance is the leading specialty insurance carrier serving emerging industries, including digital assets & Web3, AI, the space economy, fintech, and beyond. We provide more than just risk protection, we make innovation resilient.
subject: Joseph + Launched a Web3 product suite + digital assets
emailBody: Hey Joseph — saw Relm launched a Web3 product suite offering tailored insurance for digital assets and emerging tech. I wanted to run something by you since those product rollouts often leave a trail of lukewarm broker leads and paused conversations while buyers wait on coverage clarity or pricing for novel risks. We run a database reactivation service that nudges inactive prospects with light SMS/email sequences tied to your new Web3, D&O, and EPC offerings. For Relm it’s a low-lift way to turn stalled interest into active placements without adding headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom showing how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}

title: CEO / Co-founder
organization_short_description:
Technology is disrupting the insurance industry and agencies need to take the initiative if they want to remain competitive in the upcoming disruption. COVU takes a holistic approach to ensure that the agency thrives by delivering a great customer experience through a combination of technology, real-time service, and sales support. 

Agency's book experiences higher retention and more cross-sales leading to higher profitability for its owner(s). Agency producers get more time to prospect and sell to new higher-value customers.
subject: Ali + $16M Raise + agency integrations
emailBody: Hey Ali — saw Covu secure $16M to expand its AI-native insurance platform and accelerate multi-agency integrations. With the Lords and Mitchell acquisitions, I imagine a lot of onboarding and a backlog of policyholders or local leads that went quiet during transitions. I wanted to run something by you: we run a database reactivation service that re-engages inactive leads and lapsed policyholders via light SMS/email follow-ups tied to product updates and smoother agent handoffs. For Covu, it’s a low-lift way to reactivate books from acquired agencies without adding headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}
